Content.Text:
<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, great timing. Get over here.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was feeling sick the other day and
you carried me home, right?
<PAGE>
I'd like to treat you to a meal, as way
to say thanks. Will you eat with me?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great, let's eat. Sit down, go ahead.
Clement, bring the menu!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome, welcome! What can I get you?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
There's no need to hold back, <MYNAME>. Go
right ahead and pick whatever you like.
What should I do?
Order a lot
Order a normal amount
Order a little
Order just one thing

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, you're going to eat all that? Sure,
it's not a problem. Clement, my good
man, away to the kitchen with you!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you very much! I'll have your
order to you shortly!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You certainly ate a lot today, <MYNAME>!
Where did you put it all? It was fun to
watch you eat, anyway.
<PAGE>
It's worth treating someone when you
know they're gonna eat so heartily!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's no need to be embarrassed. I'm
the one who said you should eat all you
like, and I don't regret it!
<PAGE>
You must be full now, I take it?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great, glad to hear it. Seeing you look
so happy makes me feel happy too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>You've still got work to do, I take it?
Sorry for delaying you, then.
<PAGE>
I'm going to hang out here for a while
longer, so you can go on back to work.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Take it away, Clement.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good! Please wait just a short
while.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, how was it? Good?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad to hear it. You've still got
work to do, I take it? Sorry for
delaying you, then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'm going to hang out here for a while
longer, so you can go on back to work.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
T-That's all you want? You can eat as
much as you like, okay?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good! It will be with you very
quickly!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, you held back, didn't you?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Don't lie to cover it up. I'm a pretty
good judge of character. I admit, I feel
a little hurt...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, maybe I was too pushy as well.
Don't worry about it.
<PAGE>
You've still got work to do, I take it?
Sorry for delaying you, then.
<PAGE>
I'm going to hang out here for a while
longer, so you can go on back to work.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? That's it?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Very good! It will be with you very
quickly!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, are you feeling ill?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Don't lie to cover it up. I'm a pretty
good judge of character. I admit, I feel
a little hurt...

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, maybe I was too pushy as well.
Don't worry about it.
<PAGE>
You've still got work to do, I take it?
Sorry for delaying you, then.
<PAGE>
I'm going to hang out here for a while
longer, so you can go on back to work.
